com.telesign.util

Class TeleSignRequest

  • Object
    • com.telesign.util.TeleSignRequest

  • public class TeleSignRequest
extends Object
    The TeleSignRequest class is an abstraction for creating and sending HTTP 1.1 REST Requests for TeleSign web services.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private String base
      The Base URI.
      private String body
      The contents of the entity body in the POST Request.
      private HttpURLConnection connection
      The persistent session connection for the Request.
      private String customer_id
      Your TeleSign Customer ID.
      private TreeMap<String,String> headers
      The set of HTTP 1.1 Request header field/value pairs.
      private HashMap<String,String> params
      The set of HTTP 1.1 Request parameter attribute/value pairs.
      private boolean post
      A boolean value indicates the Request Method.
      private String resource
      The name of the network resource.
      private String secret_key
      Your TeleSign Secret Shared Key (available from the TeleSign Client Portal).
      private boolean ts_date
      A boolean value that indicates whether the TeleSign-specific Date Request header field is used.
      private TreeMap<String,String> ts_headers
      The set of TeleSign-specific Request header field/value pairs.
      private URL url
      The absolute form of the Resource URI

    • Field Detail

      • base

        private final String base
        The Base URI. For TeleSign web services, this is https://rest.telesign.com/.

      • body

        private String body
        The contents of the entity body in the POST Request.

      • connection

        private HttpURLConnection connection
        The persistent session connection for the Request.

      • customer_id

        private final String customer_id
        Your TeleSign Customer ID. This represents your TeleSign account number.

      • headers

        private TreeMap<String,String> headers
        The set of HTTP 1.1 Request header field/value pairs.

      • params

        private HashMap<String,String> params
        The set of HTTP 1.1 Request parameter attribute/value pairs.

      • post

        private boolean post
        A boolean value indicates the Request Method. True for POST, and False for GET.

      • resource

        private final String resource
        The name of the network resource. Each of the TeleSign web services is identified by its resource specifier.

      • secret_key

        private final String secret_key
        Your TeleSign Secret Shared Key (available from the TeleSign Client Portal).

      • ts_date

        private boolean ts_date
        A boolean value that indicates whether the TeleSign-specific Date Request header field is used.

      • ts_headers

        private TreeMap<String,String> ts_headers
        The set of TeleSign-specific Request header field/value pairs.

      • url

        private URL url
        The absolute form of the Resource URI

    • Constructor Detail

      • TeleSignRequest

        public TeleSignRequest(String base,
               String resource,
               String method,
               String customer_id,
               String secret_key)
        The TeleSitgnRequest class constructor. A TeleSitgnRequest object contains all of the information required to call any/all of the TeleSign web services.
        Parameters:
        base - [Required] A string representing the Base URI. For TeleSign web services, this is https://rest.telesign.com/.
        resource - [Required] A string representing the name of the network resource. Each of the TeleSign web services is identified by its resource specifier.
        method - [Required] A string representing the method to be performed on the resource. For TeleSign web services, this is either GET or POST.
        customer_id - [Required] A string representing your TeleSign Customer ID. This represents your TeleSign account number.
        secret_key - [Required] A string representing your TeleSign Secret Shared Key (available from the TeleSign Client Portal).

    • Method Detail

      • addHeader

        public void addHeader(String key,
             String value)
        Adds an HTTP 1.1 Request header field/value pair to the set of Request Headers.
        Parameters:
        key - [Required] A string representing a Request header field name.
        value - [Required] A string representing a Request header field value.

      • addParam

        public void addParam(String key,
            String value)
        Adds an HTTP 1.1 Request parameter attribute/value pair to the set of Request Parameters.
        Parameters:
        key - [Required] A string representing a Request parameter attribute name.
        value - [Required] A string representing a Request parameter attribute value.

      • executeRequest

        public String executeRequest()
                      throws IOException
        Creates and sends the REST request.
        Returns:
        A string containing the TeleSign web server's Response.
        Throws:
        IOException - A SignatureException signals that an error occurred while attempting to sign the Request.

      • getAllHeaders

        public Map<String,String> getAllHeaders()
        Returns the set of both the standard and the TeleSign-specific Request header fields.
        Returns:
        A sorted key/value mapping that contains all of the Request header fields.

      • getAllParams

        public Map<String,String> getAllParams()
        Returns the set of POST Request parameters.
        Returns:
        A sorted key/value mapping that contains all of the POST Request parameters.

      • getPostBody

        public String getPostBody()
        Gets the entity body of an HTTP 1.1 POST Request message. Used for calls to Verify.call and Verify.sms.
        Returns:
        A string that contains the contents of the POST Request's entity body.

      • getSigningString

        private String getSigningString(String customer_id)
        Create the string to sign. This is a helper method, used interanlly by the executeRequest() method.
        Parameters:
        customer_id - [Required] A string representing your TeleSign Customer ID. This represents your TeleSign account number.
        Returns:
        A string representing the signing string used to create a Signature object, for the authenticate the REST request.

      • getTsHeaders

        public Map<String,String> getTsHeaders()
        Returns the set of TeleSign-specific Request header fields.
        Returns:
        A sorted key/value mapping that contains the TeleSign-specific Request header fields.

      • hmacsha1

        private String hmacsha1(String data,
              String key)
                 throws SignatureException
        Creates the Signature component for the Authorization header field. Uses your Secret Key to encode the stringToSign. This is a helper method, used interanlly by the executeRequest() method.
        Parameters:
        data - [Required] The stringToSign.
        key - [Required] Your TeleSign API Key. Also known as your Secret Key, and your Shared Cryptographic Key. It s a bese64-encoded string value.
        Returns:
        A String containing the Base64-encoded hash-based message authentication code.
        Throws:
        SignatureException - Failed to generate HMAC. IllegalArgumentException - if algorithm is null or key is null or empty.

      • setPostBody

        public void setPostBody(String post_body)
        Sets the entity body of an HTTP 1.1 POST Request message. Contains the Request parameters for Verify.call and Verify.sms.
        Parameters:
        post_body - [Required] A string that contains the contents of the POST Request's entity body.
